dataIdInfo.idPurp: This toolset contains several accessory tools to help the mapping process.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The Accessory_Tools toolbox currently contains four tools. Please see the detailed metadata from each tool.

  1. Merge Connected Features Tool: This tool merges polygon features that are connected through shared points or borders.

  2. Connect Nearby Linear Features Tool: This tool connects nearby linear bathymetric high or low features.

  3. Connect Nearby Linear HF Features Tool: This tool connects nearby linear bathymetric low features through their feet and heads.

  4. Update Feature Boundary Tool: This tool merges overlapped features and update the feature boundary.

searchKeys.keyword: This toolset contains several accessory tools to help the mapping process.
